Question: Which statements are true regarding the film *Raabta* and its production?
Options:
A. a) The film production of Raabta began in 2015.
B. b) Raabta has been accused of plagiarism related to Magadheera.
C. c) Raabta was released in 2015.
D. d) Allu Aravind filed a legal notice against Raabta.
Answer: a) The film production of Raabta began in 2015., b) Raabta has been accused of plagiarism related to Magadheera., d) Allu Aravind filed a legal notice against Raabta.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Raabta*?
Options:
A. The production of Raabta started in 2015.
B. Raabta was originally scheduled for release in 2016.
C. Raabta was released on 9 June 2017.
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie Raabta?
Options:
A. a) The budget of Raabta is ₹59.07 Crores.
B. b) Raabta has faced plagiarism allegations from the movie Magadheera.
C. c) Raabta was released in 2017.
D. d) The budget of Magadheera is higher than that of Raabta.
Answer: a) The budget of Raabta is ₹59.07 Crores. and b) Raabta has faced plagiarism allegations from the movie Magadheera.

Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding the movie Raabta and its screen count?
Options:
A. a) Raabta had a total screen count of 1820 in India.
B. b) Raabta was alleged to have copied scenes from Magadheera.
C. c) The total screen count for Raabta overseas was 330.
D. d) Allu Aravind is the producer of Raabta.
Answer:
a) Raabta had a total screen count of 1820 in India. 
b) Raabta was alleged to have copied scenes from Magadheera.
